records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about collection of soil sample for soil testing?
records.KccAns: recommended for  Aside from DIB hole clean from top to bottom 2 cm Thick clay clean bucket or tray and put in the bottom to take out. collected the soil by hand, mix thoroughly and put on clean clothes pile , make a goal . Different finger to remove dirt from the pile of four equal parts . Now the remaining two parts of the soil again to mix well and set goals . This process is then repeated until almost half forts Top soil remains . The representative samples.

records.QueryText: Asked about paddy gingee market rate
records.KccAns: Recommended for paddy gingee market rate Rs.2385/quintal

Grow panama resisitant cultivar, Robusta or dwarf Cavendish.
Select the palnting material free from disease.
At the time of planting treat the rhizome in Carbendazim 50 Wdiv. solution for 30 min. (1 g./lit. water).
If disease noticed during growing period make a small hole on rhizome and inject 10 ml. Carbendazim 50 Wdiv. solution (20 g. in a lit. water) and plug the hole with mud. Repeat the injuction at bimonthly intervals.
For preparation of jivamrut use 10 kg cow dung + 10 liter cow urine + 2 kg flour mill  + 2 kg jaggary + 200 liter water skake well morning and evening till 4 -6 days.
